properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 250 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND TAKING
ON WATER IN 33-30N 012-10E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX:  390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
